title: The Alien Pilot's Match
description: I never desired to find THE ONE, but now that I have, I will do anything to make her MINE.QUINN : Floating through space, cramped into an escape pod with the known universe's most intolerable egoist was so not on today's agenda. And yet, that's what's happening.Pressed against a hard chest, barely being able to move and feeling his… uhm other hardening part does nothing to increase my comfort level.No matter how good-looking he is. I don't care. I don't.GALLUS : Training hotshot pilots to pass their final test has been my job for the past four years. This is supposed to be my last class before I can join the fight against the hated Abbaddoths.So why did the gods see fit to throw the known universe's most obstinate female into my path? And made her irresistibly beautiful and stubborn as hell?And if that isn't enough, now, thanks to her, we are trapped in an escape pod—meant for one person—floating through the universe. While our bodies are pressed so close together, we are almost fused to one another. Arousing instincts in me I rather not explore.But they are there. Even though I don't understand why I suddenly feel protective of her. Or care if she is comfortable.
author: Bella  Blair
